sha256_cert_fingerprints: Replace with your app's SHA-256 fingerprint
For debug builds, you can use the debug keystore located at ~/.android/debug.keystore
For release builds, use the keystore you created for signing your app
Make sure to replace this with your actual SHA-256 fingerprint
You can also run the following command in your terminal to get the SHA-256 fingerprint:
This will show you the SHA-256 fingerprint for both debug and release builds
Upload the assetlinks.json file to the root of your web server
and ensure it is accessible at https://yourdomain.com/.well-known/assetlinks.json
